page.title: 02Richmond.A playground game.
page.content: This is how you play the game. You have a ball while the other children run around. When the person who is on gets the ball they have to say "FREEZE!".Everyone should stop as they are and the person who is on rolls the ball to hit someone below the knee.If they hit a person they are on and the game starts all over again. But if the person who is on does not hit anyone they have to get the ball back, while the others run away. When the person who is on picks up the ball they say "FREEZE"again and the game carries on.
